𐎈 HOTA H+Y+T animal(hides) Häute hides

𓎛 𓏏 𓂝 𓆱 𓏤 “bed” ⇔ Hut < cot "bed"
𓎛 𓂝 𓍘 𓇋 𓆱 𓏤 “bed” #ḥꜥtj ዐራት ʿärat 𒄑𒈿 ⇔ hearth Hert
